Bash(bash -c 'for pid in 9684 15196 21948 23268; do kill -9 $pid 2>/dev/null; done; sleep 2; echo ""Killed all PIDs""; netstat -ano | grep LISTENING | grep -E ""(5000|7000|8888|9000)"" || echo ""âœ… All ports are free""')

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Allow admin and user roles to access leave endpoints

Added explicit role authorization \(admin,user,superadmin\) to all leave API endpoints 
to fix 401 Unauthorized errors for these roles:
- GET /api/leaves/my
- GET /api/leaves/pending
- POST /api/leaves/apply
- POST /api/leaves/validate-dates
- GET /api/leaves/{id}
- GET /api/leaves/employee/{employeeId}
- GET /api/leaves/employee/{employeeId}/{year}
- GET /api/leaves/allotments/{employeeId}/{year}
- GET /api/leaves/employee/{employeeId}/{year}/{month}/approved-dates
- GET /api/leaves/employee/{employeeId}/years
- POST /api/leaves \(create\)
- PUT /api/leaves/{id} \(update\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF

Bash(powershell -Command "
# Directories to delete
$dirs = @\(
    ''.local'', ''.config'', ''attached_assets'', ''ClientApp'', ''db'', ''db-migrations'', 
    ''dist'', ''iisnode_logs'', ''llama.cpp'', ''logs'', ''migrations'', ''node_modules'', 
    ''patches'', ''public'', ''script'', ''scripts'', ''shared'', ''tmp'', ''tmp-openapi'', ''uploads''
\)

# Files to delete
$files = @\(
    ''.env.local'', ''components.json'', ''drizzle.config.ts'', ''ecosystem.config.cjs'',
    ''ecosystem.config.js'', ''main.py'', ''package.json'', ''package-lock.json'',
    ''postcss.config.js'', ''tsconfig.json'', ''vite.config.ts'', ''vite-plugin-meta-images.ts'',
    ''web.config'', ''frontend-web.config'', ''ai.ts'', ''cookies.txt'', ''convert_pg_to_mssql.py'',
    ''convert_pg_to_mssql_v2.py'', ''nul'', ''payload.json'', ''pms.json'', 
    ''readme_for_prod_plesk_host.txt'', ''replit.md'', ''site.json'', ''site-bad.json'',
    ''site-full.json'', ''sites.json'', ''vendor.json'', ''vendors.json''
\)

$deletedDirs = 0
$deletedFiles = 0

# Delete directories
foreach \($dir in $dirs\) {
    $path = Join-Path -Path ''.'' -ChildPath $dir
    if \(Test-Path $path\) {
        Write-Host ""Deleting directory: $dir""
        Remove-Item -Path $path -Recurse -Force
        $deletedDirs++
    }
}

# Delete files
foreach \($file in $files\) {
    $path = Join-Path -Path ''.'' -ChildPath $file
    if \(Test-Path $path\) {
        Write-Host ""Deleting file: $file""
        Remove-Item -Path $path -Force
        $deletedFiles++
    }
}

Write-Host """"
Write-Host ""Cleanup Complete!"" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host ""Deleted $deletedDirs directories""
Write-Host ""Deleted $deletedFiles files""
Write-Host """"
Write-Host ""Remaining structure:""
Write-Host ""  âœ“ backend-dotnet/ - .NET Application""
Write-Host ""  âœ“ client/ - React Application"" 
Write-Host ""  âœ“ .git/ - Version Control""
")

Bash(cmd /c "
echo Cleanup in progress...
echo.

REM Delete directories
for %%D in \(.local .config attached_assets ClientApp db db-migrations dist iisnode_logs llama.cpp logs migrations node_modules patches public script scripts shared tmp tmp-openapi uploads server\) do \(
    if exist "%%D" \(
        echo Deleting directory: %%D
        rmdir /s /q "%%D" 2>nul
    \)
\)

REM Delete specific files
del /q .env.local 2>nul
del /q components.json 2>nul
del /q drizzle.config.ts 2>nul
del /q ecosystem.config.cjs 2>nul
del /q ecosystem.config.js 2>nul
del /q main.py 2>nul
del /q package.json 2>nul
del /q package-lock.json 2>nul
del /q postcss.config.js 2>nul
del /q tsconfig.json 2>nul
del /q vite.config.ts 2>nul
del /q vite-plugin-meta-images.ts 2>nul
del /q web.config 2>nul
del /q frontend-web.config 2>nul

echo.
echo Cleanup Complete!
echo.
echo Remaining structure:
echo   KEEP: backend-dotnet/
echo   KEEP: client/
echo   KEEP: .git/
")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "
cd ''D:\\VendorRegistrationForm''

# Configuration and build files
$files = @\(
    ''.env.local'', ''components.json'', ''drizzle.config.ts'', ''ecosystem.config.cjs'',
    ''ecosystem.config.js'', ''main.py'', ''package.json'', ''package-lock.json'',
    ''postcss.config.js'', ''tsconfig.json'', ''vite.config.ts'', ''vite-plugin-meta-images.ts'',
    ''web.config'', ''frontend-web.config''
\)

$count = 0
foreach \($file in $files\) {
    if \(Test-Path $file\) {
        Remove-Item -Path $file -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
        $count++
    }
}
Write-Host ""Deleted $count config/build files""

# SQL files
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.sql'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
$sqlCount = \(Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.sql'' -File\).Count
Write-Host ""Deleted SQL migration files""

# PDF, PNG, ZIP, XLSX files
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.pdf'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.png'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.zip'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.xlsx'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Write-Host ""Deleted media files \(PDF, PNG, ZIP, XLSX\)""

# Python and Node config files
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.py'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.cjs'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''add_*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''check_*.cjs'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''create_*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''migrate*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''migrate*.ts'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''update_*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''seed*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''test_*.js'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Write-Host ""Deleted script/migration files""

# Data files
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''site*.json'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''vendor*.json'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*_generated*.xlsx'' -File | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''ai.ts'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''cookies.txt'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''payload.json'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''pms.json'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''readme_for_prod_plesk_host.txt'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''replit.md'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Path ''nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Write-Host ""Deleted data/misc files""
")
